entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
